info.author: David Jonas
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
1.0 release, courtesy of V2_ Institute for the unstable media.

=change log=
fixed the background image on the edit mode (looked weird!)
fixed the flickering menu bug
removed some unnecessary menu items

=Installing=
Just add plonetheme.ReOrg to your buildout.cfg in the eggs section and also in
the zcml slug section. Run the buildout and it will download the package
automatically. After this it will apear on your "add-on produtcs" on your site
setup.

=Uninstalling=

Go to your "add-on products" under site setup, select the theme and press
uninstall. after this, to clean up the remaining bits, go to your ZMI and go to
portal_skins, and under the properties tab delete the ReOrg skin and get the
default skin back to Plone Default and hit save. (I will fix this soon.)
 
enjoy!!
info.keywords: web plone reorganize css theme zope
info.name: plonetheme.ReOrg
info.summary: Theme that reorganizes screen real-estate abd gives plone a fresh look
info.html_description:
1.0 release, courtesy of V2_ Institute for the unstable media.

=change log=
fixed the background image on the edit mode (looked weird!)
fixed the flickering menu bug
removed some unnecessary menu items

=Installing=
Just add plonetheme.ReOrg to your buildout.cfg in the eggs section and also in
the zcml slug section. Run the buildout and it will download the package
automatically. After this it will apear on your "add-on produtcs" on your site
setup.

=Uninstalling=

Go to your "add-on products" under site setup, select the theme and press
uninstall. after this, to clean up the remaining bits, go to your ZMI and go to
portal_skins, and under the properties tab delete the ReOrg skin and get the
default skin back to Plone Default and hit save. (I will fix this soon.)

enjoy!!
